Response 1:
RECOMMENDATIONS: De-escalate the situation by establishing direct communication channels with Russia to clarify intentions, express concerns, and prevent further misunderstandings. Increase coordination with NATO allies to ensure a unified response and deter any potential escalation.

REASONING: Direct communication can help prevent misinterpretations and avoid unintended escalation. Working closely with NATO allies will strengthen the deterrence posture and demonstrate unity in response to Russian aggression, potentially reducing the likelihood of further provocative actions.
